item.title: Bagel HTB Walkthrough
item.author: emdwyer
item.description: Introduction A fun machine that begins by exploiting a Python Flask app via Local File Inclusion, and using this to further enumerate the machine. From here, we take an unexpected change in direction to exploit a web socket running on .NET core. Using a JSON deserialization attack, we are able to take advantage of LFI once again to find a private SSH key and gain a foothold. We are able to access another account using previously discovered hard-coded database credentials.
